plurals.name: show_dev_countdown_cm
plurals.item: You are now %1$d step away from enabling development settings.
You are now %1$d steps away from enabling development settings.

resources.string: No need, you have already enabled development settings.
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Force the volume panel to always appear in expanded mode
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Allowing apps to request root access is very dangerous and could compromise the security of your system!
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
This option will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display the number of pending notifications
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Display the current temperature on the status bar
Control which status bar icons are shown
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
Battery bar position and color customization
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
View and control the root rules
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
Are you sure you wish to reset counters?
Pour some fuel and spread Fire

FireHound is Custom ROM developed focusing on stability and features! Go go go, flash FireHound and change the way you use your smartphone! For more information, join our community: @ https://plus.google.com/communities/114615598909452601377
Support the Developer and FireHound Team
Go and Compile FireHound for your Device
Visit and Join Community for More Information
Donations are welcome and will be used to keep our build servers alive
Official Device Maintainers and Officially Supported Devices
Join for latest updates and remotely conversing
Values greater than %1$d%% are not recommended
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for restarting into recovery, bootloader or performing a soft restart
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Enter primary email account and associated password to reset pattern lock
Manage which apps are hidden behind a secure lock
Must draw pattern or use fingerprint to unlock
Superuser indicator is visible when a session is active
Toggle to show superuser indicator when a session is active
Check the proximity sensor prior to wake-ups triggered by gestures
Increase touchscreen sensitivity so it can be used while wearing gloves
Allows you to hover the screen like a mouse in web browsers, remote desktops, etc
No full screen interruption, peeking, sound, or vibration. Show at the bottom of the notification list. Hide from lock screen.
Show the pointer icon when hovering or drawing with the stylus
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back button
Enable various network traffic options in statusbar
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Reset network traffic color to default?
Hide the arrows in the traffic indicators
Enable the Android Debug Bridge (ADB) interface
Display a notification when USB or network debugging is enabled
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi\u2011Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Allow sounds or vibration no more than once every %1$s
Disabling the camera shutter sound is illegal in some areas! Please check the applicable law in your country
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the %1$s of your phone.
Portable Wi\u2011Fi hotspot will never timeout
Portable Wi\u2011Fi hotspot will timeout after %1$s
Specify the region code for Wi\u2011Fi
There was a problem setting the region code.
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting a power source
Prevent any use of data access via cellular networks
Prevent any use of data access via Wi\u2011Fi networks
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Display priority notifications in a small floating window
Show Google search bar in the recents screen
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Show clear all button on recents panel
Choose whether to dismiss all tasks or ignore the foreground task
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Change the password used for device encryption
Makes it so one click will turn Battery Saver on or off instead of taking you to settings
Makes it so one click will turn WiFi on or off instead of taking you to settings
Makes it so one click will turn Bluetooth on or off instead of taking you to settings
Launch the default music player when a headset is connected
Display negotiated charger max current-voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Update the built-in recovery with system updates

NOTICE: When this feature is enabled, your installed recovery will be replaced by one included with the current version of the running OS.

Your recovery will be updated along with upgrades to your system, helping to ensure compatibility with future versions.

Would you like to enable this feature?

WARNING: When this feature is disabled, your installed recovery will not be updated with OS upgrades.

Future OS updates may not install with outdated or custom recovery versions.

Do you really want to disable this feature?
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Emergency Button is visible on lockscreen
Toggle to show Emergency Button on Lockscreen
Double tap to sleep on lockscreen
Double tap anywhere on lockscreen to sleep
Enable one tap action to enable or disable data
Option to enable or disable the screenshot sound
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
